headline.main: FRENCH SET JAN. 15 FOR GAMELIN TRIAL; Blam and Daladier Also to Be Arraigned at Same Time

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 31 -- General Maurice Gustave Gamelin and former Premiers Leon Blum and Edouard Daladier will be called to trial before the Supreme Court at Riom on Jan. 15, 1942. Minister of Justice Joseph Barthelemy announced that date to the Council of Ministers here today for the opening of the trial for responsibility for the French defeat.
abstract: War guilt trial; Riom trial date set for Gen Gamelin, L Blum and E Daladier
